high_descs: Turn left and go to the night stand that is to the left of the bed, then turn right and face the bed
Pick up the book that is on the other side of the bed, the book that says Sherlock Holmes
Turn around and cross the room to the green trash can, then turn right and face the desk
Turn on the lamp that is sitting on the left side of the desk
anns.task_desc: Read a book by lamp light

high_descs: turn left and walk to the nightstand. turn right towards the bed
pick up the book from the bed
turn around and walk to the wall. turn right and face the desk
anns.task_desc: Look at a book under a lamp

high_descs: Go to the left and then turn right to face the bed.
Pick the Sherlock Holmes book up off of the bed.
Turn around and stand in front of the lamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Pick up a book and turn the lamp on.
